OOC: Oh swell, now you tell me. Just great. well, I still need someone to 
respond to those posts. DarkMouse is in Killfest's base. Squizzy is with 
Zardus, and KitKat is going to be coming back. That part was planned before 
I left.  Besides, it could make things interesting.  If the RPG group says 
they don't want KitKat back, then I'll nix her out. Let me know.

-original message-----
>OOC: Well, Logo, you see, when Kitkat died, the predacon alliance fell 
>apart.
>They are currently in a civil war, with Drillbit, Darkfate, and Killfest's
>groups against Hell Beast's. Megatron is dead.
>
>:::Wheeljack/Hun-Grr/Ramjet/Time Warp:::
>
>::he started building the repair station::
>~~~~~
>::Hun-grr reluctantly backs off::
>Hun-Grr: Fine, Hun-grr will spare.
>::he then sees all of his team members fighting each other. He fires 1 shot
>at each of them::
>Hun-Grr: QUIT IT OR HUN-GRR WILL RIP ALL YOU PERSONALLY!
>~~~~~
>Ramjet: Im not sure about their defenses, but the Trainers have 6 bots. As
>for the Predacon group, there is a large number that grows all the time.
>~~~~~
>Time Warp: What do you think we are, stupid? We tried calling her as soon 
>as
>we got back online! But fine, try her if you'd like.
